sentence: The U.S. and our allies must take immediate actions to cripple his regime.? Rep. Liz Cheney, R-Wyo., a Trump critic who he is targeting for defeat this fall, responded Tuesday: Former President Trump's adulation of Putin today including calling him a genius' aids our enemies.
title: Trump praises Putin's 'genius' as GOP fissures grow on Ukraine crisis
